snippet: Mr. Abe also pledged to push forward with his plan to permit Japan’s military to be dispatched to conflicts abroad.
abstract: Japanese Prime Min Shinzo Abe is re-elected as leader of governing Liberal Democratic Party, defeating Seiko Noda.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Abe also pledged to push forward with his plan to permit Japan’s military to be dispatched to conflicts abroad.

headline.main: Shinzo Abe of Japan Re-elected as Leader of Ruling Party
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Japan: Prime Minister Is Re-elected Party Leader
